meanings.sent1: The preexcited children eagerly waited for the magician to start the show.
meanings.sent2: She felt preexcited about the upcoming vacation to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The preexcited puppy couldn't stop wagging its tail in anticipation of the walk.
meanings.sent4: The preexcited fans cheered loudly as their favorite team entered the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The preexcited students were buzzing with energy before the school dance.

meanings.sent1: The coach preexcited the team with an inspiring pep talk before the big game.
meanings.sent2: She preexcited her friends by hinting at the surprise party she was planning.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of freshly baked cookies preexcited his senses as he entered the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The suspenseful movie trailer preexcited the audience for the film's release.
meanings.sent5: The thought of the upcoming promotion preexcited him to work harder than ever before.
